.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
     
Level and Code of Accounts Explanations
=======================================

In ACCERT, different cost elements are broken up into different levels with different code of accounts to correlate.

The levels have the following structure:

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    
    level0.rst
    level1.rst
    level2.rst
    level3.rst
